TopicTitle: Would like to watch live streams but can't. Please help.

Articles.Content: I have seen that Capt Skunky and others do some live streams of KSP. I would really like to watch some of these even if not live, but the twitch app on the iPhone dosnt seem to have a search function. I find this very strange for this type of app. Also cant wacth on the web site as iphone dosnt seem to work with the adobe thingy. Please help me watch these streams on the iPhone, please please please with a Mk16 Parachute on top.
